title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.235 - Required evaluation and testing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.235 - Required evaluation and testing

State Regulations

No operator shall permit a covered employee who has
engaged in conduct prohibited by sections 262.215 through
262.223
of this Part to perform
covered functions unless the employee has met the requirements of section
262.243
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.235

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
